title: How to spy on my wife's WhatsApp conversations without touching her phone - Quora

response.answer_text: If you know for sure that she’s cheating on you, don’t waste your time on becoming FBI agent to track her activities on daily basis. Sit with her, talk to her and let her know that you know what she did. Open up with her and seek the information from her. There’s no use of spying on her mobile. If you’re suspicious that she might have an extramarital affair, you can spy..but if you know for sure that she’s cheating..it’s time to talk to her openly.
